text: Panagiotis Pikrammenos (, ; born 26 July 1945) is a Greek judge and politician. From 9 July 2019 to 25 May 2023, he has been the Deputy Prime Minister of Greece. He was the caretaker Prime Minister of Greece from May 16, 2012 to June 20, 2012 after the legislative election in May 2012 resulted in an absence of majority. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Prime ministers of Greece Category:Greek judges Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Athens
title: Panagiotis Pikrammenos
